name: Pixel Kunoichi
description:
A female ninja fights!
Female ninjas have been called Kunoichi.

This is Japanese action game!
Defeat your enemies with your sword and shuriken.



The game is easy to operate.
You can play with direction button and 3 buttons.
Please see the following for the operation method.

Direction: move
X: Attack
A: Shuriken
B: Fire Shuriken (consumable item)



Feature:
・Pixel Art
・Smooth animation
・Ninja
・Action games
・16-bit graphic
